title.rendered: Promotion- Twitch and Westmont Public Library

content.rendered:
Hey everyone- just thought I’d inform you all that Eric Say will be streaming more graphic design for Daggers High on his Twitch Steam tomorrow (November 10th, Sunday)! Please follow his Twitch stream if you would like to follow along: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics/videos/all

The stream will likely take place at 8 AM Central time, but it could change depending on Eric’s schedule.

 

Also, on December 20th I will be showing Daggers High at the Westmont Public Library from 7-9 pm! If you are interested, feel free to stop by and check it out!

 

Quick note. It uses the old spelling “Dagers High”, since the Westmont Public Library organized this event before I had changed the spelling of the game.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Westmont Public Library Play Test Photo
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Today I thought I'd share a photo of a play test at the Westmont Public Library. This was a two-player play test with both players never having completed a game before. The game took just under 2 hours, including the explanation of the rules. The comments were overall…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Kickstarter Day Seven: Student Discounts, Kicktraq, and Disabled Ad Account
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! It's been a while since I last posted one of these. In fact, an entire week has gone by! Wow, it's crazy to think that I've been managing this project for so long. Anyway, I just wanted to share a few things about the status of the project.…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Official Rulebook
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Over the past few days I have been writing up an official rulebook for Daggers High. I ended up choosing to use LaTex to make the rulebook because it's simple and clean, and doesn't require too much graphical design work. Plus, I already knew how to use LaTex…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Purchase Daggers High on The Game Crafter
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hi everyone! I thought that I would just take a moment to share the new progress I've had with Daggers High. You may be aware that Daggers High recently launched and failed on Kickstarter. Although this was disappointing, I still wanted to find a way to get Daggers High into…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Twitch Stream
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Hey everyone! Check out this Twitch Stream: https://www.twitch.tv/esaygraphics. Eric is generously working on graphic designs for Daggers High!

jetpack-related-posts.title: Interview with the Friendly Boardgamer
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Friendly Boardgamer just released an interview featuring me! You can check out the original article here: https://thefriendlyboardgamer.wordpress.com/2019/06/05/jorge-zhang-daggers-highschool/ Here is the article: This interview is with Jorge Zhang who is the designer of Daggers Highschool, a game about bribing your way in to the best University. We also talked about…
